Package com.kicas.rp.event

Class EntityEventHandler

java.lang.Object
com.kicas.rp.event.EntityEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class EntityEventHandler extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Handles events caused or related to non-player entities.

  • Method Details

    • onEntityChangeBlock

      public void onEntityChangeBlock(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityChangeBlockEvent event)
      Handle enderman grief and fire arrows/dispenser-fired fire balls causing damage by hitting TNT or setting things on fire. Also handles the animal-grief-blocks and hostile-grief-blocks flags.
      Parameters:
      event - the event.

    • onEntityDamageEntity

    • onEntityExplosion

      public void onEntityExplosion(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityExplodeEvent event)
      Prevent entity explosions (including the explosion of the primed TNT entity) from damaging claims.
      Parameters:
      event - the event.

    • onPotionSplash

      public void onPotionSplash(org.bukkit.event.entity.PotionSplashEvent event)
      Prevent splash potions from splashing. Note: effects from outside a border may slip in.
      Parameters:
      event - the event.

    • onPotionSplash

      Prevent lingering splash potions from splashing. Note: effects from outside a border may slip in.
      Parameters:
      event - the event.

    • onEntityTeleport

      Parameters:
      event - the event.
